raw_meta_yaml:
context:
  name: sqlite-minutils
  version: 4.0.2
  python_min: "3.9"

package:
  name: ${{ name|lower }}
  version: ${{ version }}

source:
  url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/${{ name[0] }}/${{ name }}/${{ name }}-${{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 4ed01ff525ffded7c43fa8c963b2566733943b769be5cb408acd97feff626fac

build:
  number: 0
  noarch: python
  script: ${{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . -vv --no-deps --no-build-isolation

requirements:
  host:
    - python ${{ python_min }}
    - setuptools >=64.0
    - wheel
    - pip
  run:
    - python >=${{ python_min }}
    - fastcore

tests:
  - python:
      imports:
        - sqlite_minutils
      pip_check: true
  - script:
      - python -c "import sqlite_minutils"
    requirements:
      run:
      - python ${{ python_min }}

about:
  summary: A fork of sqlite-utils with CLI etc removed
  license: Apache-2.0
  license_file: LICENSE
  homepage: https://github.com/AnswerDotAI/sqlite-minutils
  repository: https://github.com/AnswerDotAI/sqlite-minutils

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - synapticarbors
